title: Linux tty Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux tty command and learn how to identify the current terminal device, manage terminal sessions, and apply practical examples to enhance your system administration skills.

meta.title: Linux tty Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux tty command and learn how to identify the current terminal device, manage terminal sessions, and apply practical examples to enhance your system administration skills.
meta.keywords: Linux, tty, terminal, session, system administration, networking, communication

verify.name: Verify the tty command output
verify.hint: The tty command should return a valid terminal device, such as /dev/pts/0. If the output is "not a tty", the verification will fail.

verify.name: Verify the tty command output

steps.title: Manage Terminal Sessions with the tty Command

verify.name: Verify the script command
verify.hint: The script command should create a terminal session log file at /tmp/terminal-session.log. If the file does not exist, the verification will fail.
